      • isUndefined

        public boolean isUndefined()
        Checks if the course is undefined. Course which names match "A DEFINIR" or "NON DEFINI" or "UNDEFINED" are considered as templates.
        Returns:
        true if undefined

      • isATP

        public boolean isATP()
        Checks if the course is a single workshop (discovery workshop).
        Returns:
        true if code == ATP_CODE
        Since:
        2.4.a 04/05/12

      • isInstCode

        public boolean isInstCode()
        Checks if course's code is of instrument type.
        Returns:
        true if code == PRIVATE_INSTRUMENT_CODE
